XI.i.1.C.2.a
.
Erroneous Date of Death in Same Month as the Correct Date of Death
Complete a BIRLS UPDATE to correct the date of death if the
NOD was processed with an erroneous date of death, and
erroneous date of death is in the same month as the correct date of death.
Result
:  The system automatically adjusts the termination date if the Veteran had a running compensation or pension award at the time of death.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C  - Errors During Notice of Death (NOD) Processing
citation: Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C
